project.author: Can E.
project.description: Forensic-grade DLP tool for KVKK/GDPR compliance that detects and validates PII/Secrets in logs using mathematical algorithms and Shannon entropy analysis.
features: Mathematical validation (Modulo 11 for TCKN, Luhn for Credit Cards)
Shannon entropy analysis for secret detection (threshold > 4.5 bits)
Memory-efficient line-by-line stream processing (~15MB constant RAM usage)
Interactive Streamlit dashboard with risk scoring and visual analytics
Automated environment self-checks and comprehensive test suite (41+ tests)
Forensic masking of sensitive data (e.g., 10*********6) for compliance
